pageContext.claim: “We had one setback. We had one tremendous victory [in the 2018 midterms]. And I had a tremendous victory that was very rarely covered by the press.”
pageContext.analysis: There was extensive coverage of the Senate races. There is little historic about a one-seat gain in the Senate; Republicans had started the session with 52 seats. In fact, given that mostly Democratic seats were up for reelection, in many red seats, the outcome was not unexpected.
